response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant importance to me, reflecting my commitment to excellence and innovation. I understand its potential worth to you stands at $1,200,000. Considering this, I would like to extend an offer to you at a price that reflects both the value of the product and my desire to ensure it reaches someone who appreciates it as much as I do. My proposed price for the product is $950,000. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing the value of the product. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 950000}
